snippet: To combat a rise in cybercrime, the European Commission is considering a plan to require some of the biggest Web businesses to report the loss or theft of personal data, or risk sanctions and fines.
abstract: European Commission, in effort to combat rise in cybercrime, is considering plan to require some of the biggest Web businesses to report loss or theft of personal data, or risk sanctions and fines.
lead_paragraph: To combat a rise in cybercrime, the European Commission is considering a plan to require some of the biggest Web businesses to report the loss or theft of personal data, or risk sanctions and fines.

headline.main: Europe Weighs Requiring Firms to Disclose Data Breaches
headline.print_headline: Europe Considers a Requirement to Report Data Breaches
